column4: hi there, I have a problem with reinstallation of xserver-xorg-core and some other xorg packages
when I mark them to reinstall synaptic tells me what he can't download these packages
so, maybe someone here know how to reinstall xorg?
what problem are you having in particular?
I updated xorg to edgers version from launchpad
oops
and now my mouse pointer works strange
I did that once.  Bad things happened to me. :)
now I want to roll it back
Do you still have access to the desktop, Synaptec, etc?
yep
everything ok
except problems with mouse
Well, if you go to your etc/apt/sources.lst (or Software Sources in the Admin menu) and remove the PPA,
already removed
you should be able to then go into Synaptec and install an older version of Xorg as needed.  (See the "additional info" at the bottom, there is a "which version to install?" section)
oops, the above was for Lain_13
I reinstalled part of xorg using synaptic
and...?
but part of xort still not reinstalled and synaptic can't reinstall it
it telling me what don't know where to download these packages
hmm.  Ask your question again and let someone smarter than me take a whack at it.
it's xserver-xorg-core and some other
